message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you, given its worth of $12,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $11,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
